concept.title: What Is LinkedIn
concept.shortdesc: Users can connect with other professionals by building a network and utilizing select features on LinkedIn.

section.title: What is LinkedIn
section.p: LinkedIn, founded in 2003, is a social network specifically designed for the professional community. It allows users to create profiles, showcase their skills and experience, and connect with other professionals.

section.title: Features of LinkedIn
section.p: LinkedIn offers a range of features designed to enhance professional networking:

dlentry.dd: Users can create a detailed profile, showcasing their resume, skills, achievements, and career history.
LinkedIn allows users to connect with others in their field, send messages, and grow their network.
LinkedInâ€™s job portal provides a platform for users to search for jobs, apply directly, and receive job recommendations.
Connections can endorse each other's skills and provide written recommendations, adding credibility to profiles.
Users can share articles, post updates, and engage with content shared by others to build their online presence.
